headline: [VIDEO] Kari Lake Masterfully OWNS ABC Reporter Who Asks “Gotcha Question” On 2020 Election
author: Missy Crane
sentences:
MORE NEWS: Hidden Data Inside Tucker’s Ratings Show Why The Left is Going After Him So Hard
So, heading into this campaign, she’s got a magnificent weapon to wield against the media – she can beat them at their own game, and she just did with a local ABC reporter who tried her best to get Kari with a 2020 election “GOTCHA” question.

Masterclass.#Karizona https://t.co/h9JlM4S6sl
— Brick Suit (@Brick_Suit) February 3, 2022
This is the type of politician we need – someone who can handle the media like a boss.
Lake turned the tables on the reporter and asked HER questions about the election, and took her to task on her lack of fair coverage.
Kari Lake was one of the most popular local news anchors before she threw up her hands and said, “enough is enough” and walked away.
But Kari, like the master she is, turned the tables on the reporter, and actually had HER answering 2020 election questions.
Because let’s face it, the media is one of the strongest weapons the left has in their arsenal… and they use it like a nuke.
And it’s gonna be really hard for the media to trip her up because she knows all their tricks…she was one of them.
She turns the tables, questions them about the election, and takes them to task on their lack of fair coverage.
Kari looked like a professor showing her class how to OWN the media.
Kari Lake is going to make an amazing governor of Arizona.
To successfully disarm that threat is a huge win.
@KariLake handles this interview like a boss.
She will be like the “DeSantis” of the west.
Just look how it helped President Trump.

You can watch the video below:
.
It was quite a sight to see.
